remarks.format: ## Remarks `ChDir`函数更改默认的目录，但不是在默认驱动器。The `ChDir` function changes the default directory, but not the default drive. 例如，如果默认驱动器 C，以下语句会更改驱动器 D 上的默认目录，但 C 保留默认驱动器：For example, if the default drive is C, the following statement changes the default directory on drive D, but C remains the default drive: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#39)] 你可以相对目录更改为通过键入两个句点，如下所示：You can make relative directory changes is by typing two periods, as follows: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#40)] > [!IMPORTANT] > `ChDir`函数需要非托管的代码的权限，这可能会影响在部分信任情况下其执行。The `ChDir` function requires unmanaged code permission, which may affect its execution in partial-trust situations. 有关详细信息，请参阅和。For more information, see and . ## Examples 此示例使用`ChDir`函数来更改当前目录或文件夹。This example uses the `ChDir` function to change the current directory or folder. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#41](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#41)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dir`函数支持多个字符的使用 (`*`) 和单字符 (`?`) 通配符来指定多个文件。The `Dir` function supports the use of multiple-character (`*`) and single-character (`?`) wildcards to specify multiple files. `VbVolume` 返回而不是特定文件名的驱动器的卷标签。`VbVolume` returns the volume label for the drive instead of a specific file name. 必须提供`PathName`第一次调用`Dir`函数。You must supply a `PathName` the first time that you call the `Dir` function. 若要检索的下一项，你可以后续调用`Dir`不带参数的函数。To retrieve the next item, you can make subsequent calls to the `Dir` function without parameters. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要正确运行，`Dir`函数需要和标志才能被授予对执行代码。To run correctly, the `Dir` function requires the and flags of to be granted to the executing code. 有关详细信息，请参阅， ，和[代码访问权限](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675)。For more information, see , , and [Code Access Permissions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675). `Attributes`参数枚举值如下所示：The `Attributes` argument enumeration values are as follows: |“值”Value|返回的常量Constant|描述Description| |-|-|-| |`Normal`|`vbnormal`|默认。Default. 指定无特性文件。Specifies files without attributes.| |`ReadOnly`|`vbReadOnly`|指定只读文件，以及带属性的文件。Specifies read-only files, and also files without attributes.| |`Hidden`|`vbHidden`|指定隐藏的文件，以及带属性的文件。Specifies hidden files, and also files without attributes.| |`System`|`vbSystem`|指定系统文件，以及带属性的文件。Specifies system files, and also files without attributes.| |`Volume`|`vbVolume`|指定卷标签;如果指定其他任何属性，则`vbVolume`将被忽略。Specifies volume label; if any other attribute is specified, `vbVolume` is ignored.| |`Directory`|`vbDirectory`|指定目录或文件夹，以及带属性的文件。Specifies directories or folders, and also files without attributes.| |`Archive`|`vbArchive`|自上次备份以来已更改文件。File has changed since last backup.| |`Alias`|`vbAlias`|文件具有不同的名称。File has a different name.| > [!NOTE] > 这些枚举由 Visual Basic 语言指定，并且可以使用而非实际值在代码中的任意位置。These enumerations are specified by the Visual Basic language and can be used anywhere in your code instead of the actual values. ## Examples 此示例使用`Dir`函数来检查某些文件和目录是否存在。This example uses the `Dir` function to check if certain files and directories exist. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dir`函数支持多个字符的使用 (`*`) 和单字符 (`?`) 通配符来指定多个文件。The `Dir` function supports the use of multiple-character (`*`) and single-character (`?`) wildcards to specify multiple files. `VbVolume` 返回而不是特定文件名的驱动器的卷标签。`VbVolume` returns the volume label for the drive instead of a specific file name. 必须提供`PathName`第一次调用`Dir`函数。You must supply a `PathName` the first time that you call the `Dir` function. 若要检索的下一项，你可以后续调用`Dir`不带任何参数的函数。To retrieve the next item, you can make subsequent calls to the `Dir` function with no parameters. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要正确运行，`Dir`函数需要和标志才能被授予对执行代码。To run correctly, the `Dir` function requires the and flags of to be granted to the executing code. 有关详细信息，请参阅， ，和[代码访问权限](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675)。For more information, see , , and [Code Access Permissions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675). `Attributes`参数枚举值如下所示：The `Attributes` argument enumeration values are as follows: |“值”Value|返回的常量Constant|描述Description| |-|-|-| |`Normal`|`vbnormal`|默认。Default. 指定无特性的文件。Specifies files that have no attributes.| |`ReadOnly`|`vbReadOnly`|指定只读文件，除了不具任何属性的文件。Specifies read-only files, in addition to files that have no attributes.| |`Hidden`|`vbHidden`|指定隐藏的文件，除了不具任何属性的文件。Specifies hidden files, in addition to files that have no attributes.| |`System`|`vbSystem`|指定系统文件，除了不具任何属性的文件。Specifies system files, in addition to files that have no attributes.| |`Volume`|`vbVolume`|指定卷标签;如果指定其他任何属性，则`vbVolume`将被忽略。Specifies volume label; if any other attribute is specified, `vbVolume` is ignored.| |`Directory`|`vbDirectory`|指定目录或文件夹，以及不具任何属性的文件。Specifies directories or folders, in addition to files that have no attributes.| |`Archive`|`vbArchive`|自上次备份以来已更改文件。File has changed since last backup.| |`Alias`|`vbAlias`|文件具有不同的名称。File has a different name.| > [!NOTE] > 这些枚举由 Visual Basic 语言指定，并且可以使用的实际值替换代码中的任意位置。These enumerations are specified by the Visual Basic language and can be used anywhere in your code in place of the actual values. ## Examples 此示例使用`Dir`函数来检查某些文件和目录是否存在。This example uses the `Dir` function to check if certain files and directories exist. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`EOF`以避免通过尝试获取输入文件的末尾而产生的错误。Use `EOF` to avoid the error generated by attempting to get input past the end of a file. `EOF`函数返回`False`之前已到达文件末尾。The `EOF` function returns `False` until the end of the file has been reached. 打开以进行文件与`Random`或`Binary`访问，`EOF`返回`False`直到最后一个执行`FileGet`函数不能读取完整记录。With files opened for `Random` or `Binary` access, `EOF` returns `False` until the last executed `FileGet` function is unable to read a whole record. 打开以进行文件与`Binary`访问，请尝试通过文件使用读取`Input`函数直到`EOF`返回`True`生成错误。With files opened for `Binary` access, an attempt to read through the file using the `Input` function until `EOF` returns `True` generates an error. 使用`LOF`和`Loc`函数而不是`EOF`与二进制文件中读取时`Input`，或使用`Get`时使用`EOF`函数。Use the `LOF` and `Loc` functions instead of `EOF` when reading binary files with `Input`, or use `Get` when using the `EOF` function. 打开以进行文件与`Output`，`EOF`始终返回`True`。With files opened for `Output`, `EOF` always returns `True`. ## Examples 此示例使用`EOF`函数来检测文件末尾。This example uses the `EOF` function to detect the end of a file. 此示例假定`Testfile`是一个包含若干行文本的文本文件。This example assumes that `Testfile` is a text file that contains several lines of text. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#62](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#62)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileClose`函数提供用于向后兼容性，并且可能会影响性能。The `FileClose` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧式应用程序，`My.Computer.FileSystem`对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 使用 StreamReader 文件中读取文本](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-text-from-files-with-a-streamreader.md)，[如何： 使用 StreamWriter 向文件写入文本](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-write-text-to-files-with-a-streamwriter.md)，和[演练： 中操作文件和目录Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/walkthrough-manipulating-files-and-directories.md)。For more information, see [How to: Read Text from Files with a StreamReader](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-text-from-files-with-a-streamreader.md),[How to: Write Text to Files with a StreamWriter](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-write-text-to-files-with-a-streamwriter.md), and [Walkthrough: Manipulating Files and Directories in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/walkthrough-manipulating-files-and-directories.md). 如果省略`FileNumbers`，所有活动文件打开`FileOpen`函数将关闭。If you omit `FileNumbers`, all active files opened by the `FileOpen` function are closed. 关闭已打开以进行文件`Output`或`Append`，最终输出缓冲区写入到该文件的操作系统缓冲区。When you close files that were opened for `Output` or `Append`, the final buffer of output is written to the operating system buffer for that file. 所有关联的缓冲区空间使用的已关闭发布文件。All buffer space associated with the closed file is released. 当`FileClose`执行函数，而其文件的文件的关联是数字结束。When the `FileClose` function is executed, the association of a file with its file number ends. ## Examples 此示例使用`FileClose`函数要关闭的文件打开以进行`Input`。This example uses the `FileClose` function to close a file opened for `Input`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#69](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#69)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你尝试使用`FileCopy`函数上当前打开的文件，将会出错。If you try to use the `FileCopy` function on a currently open file, an error occurs. `FileCopy` 需要完全信任才能在本地驱动器上工作。`FileCopy` requires full trust to work on the local drive. ## Examples 此示例使用`FileCopy`函数将一个文件复制到另一个。This example uses the `FileCopy` function to copy one file to another. 在此示例中，假定`SrcFile`是包含数据的文件。For purposes of this example, assume that `SrcFile` is a file that contains data. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 此示例使用`FileDateTime`函数来确定日期和时间文件已创建或上次修改。This example uses the `FileDateTime` function to determine the date and time a file was created or last modified. 显示日期和时间的格式取决于系统的区域设置。The format of the date and time displayed is based on the locale settings of the system. remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGet` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FileGet` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 数据读取`FileGet`通常写入到的文件`FilePut`。Data read with `FileGet` is usually written to a file with `FilePut`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步的记录或最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数 (或指向由最后一个`Seek`函数) 读取。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte following the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function) is read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在从文件读取时，不要根据文件扩展名的文件的内容的相关的决策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 Form1.vb 文件可能不是 Visual Basic 源文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## 随机模式Random Mode 打开的文件中`Random`模式下，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果正在读取的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FileGet`读取的记录长度边界上的后续记录。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 将文件缓冲区的现有内容，则填充一个记录的结尾和开始下一条记录之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因为无法任何明确地确定填充的数据量，它通常是具有匹配的数据被读取的长度的记录长度一个好办法。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 默认情况下，如果读入的变量是一个字符串，`FileGet`读取包含字符串长度，然后读放入变量的数据的两个字节描述符。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本支持的固定长度字符串;当放到文件，则不写入长度描述符。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果你想要读取的字符串没有说明符，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并且读取到应正确长度的字符串。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果读入的变量是一个数组，你可以选择是否要读取的大小和数组的维度属性的描述符。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在读取数组时，必须以匹配写入数组的方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果它使用描述符编写的必须读取描述符。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果不使用说明符的大小和数组的边界传递给`FileGet`确定要读取的内容。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述符指定的秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 + 8 倍的维数: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，下面的数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 分发了 218 个字节，如下所示：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述符 18 个字节: (2 + 8 \* 2)18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200 字节的数据: (5 * 10 * 4)。200 bytes for the data: (5 * 10 * 4). - 如果读入变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FileGet`读取仅变量的数据。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于所读取的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 中读取结构的元素，每个已分别读取的只不过没有元素之间没有空白。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁盘上，用户定义类型的动态数组 (使用编写`FilePut`) 通过其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍维度数的描述符的前缀: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于进行读取的各个元素所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 这包括任何数组和其描述符。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于以指示时写入字符串的大小的结构中的 string 字段到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二进制模式下Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，但出现一些异常。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式与不同的规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续; 从磁盘读取所有变量也就是说，而不填充记录之间。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FileGet`的只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 未不读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 读取不是元素的结构不需要双字节长度说明符的可变长度字符串。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于已在字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过使用从文件读取`FileGet`函数需要`Read`从访问枚举。Reading from a file by using the`FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

如果正在读取的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FileGet`读取的记录长度边界上的后续记录。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 将文件缓冲区的现有内容，则填充一个记录的结尾和开始下一条记录之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因为无法任何明确地确定填充的数据量，它通常是具有匹配的数据被读取的长度的记录长度一个好办法。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 默认情况下，如果读入的变量是一个字符串，`FileGet`读取包含字符串长度，然后读放入变量的数据的两个字节描述符。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本支持的固定长度字符串;当放到文件，则不写入长度描述符。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果你想要读取的字符串没有说明符，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并且读取到应正确长度的字符串。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果读入的变量是一个数组，你可以选择是否要读取的大小和数组的维度属性的描述符。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在读取数组时，必须以匹配写入数组的方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果它使用描述符编写的必须读取描述符。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果不使用说明符的大小和数组的边界传递给`FileGet`确定要读取的内容。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述符指定的秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 + 8 倍的维数: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，下面的数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 分发了 218 个字节，如下所示：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述符 18 个字节: (2 + 8 \* 2)18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200 字节的数据: (5 * 10 * 4)。200 bytes for the data: (5 * 10 * 4). - 如果读入变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FileGet`读取仅变量的数据。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于所读取的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 中读取结构的元素，每个已分别读取的只不过没有元素之间没有空白。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁盘上，用户定义类型的动态数组 (使用编写`FilePut`) 通过其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍维度数的描述符的前缀: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于进行读取的各个元素所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 这包括任何数组和其描述符。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于以指示时写入字符串的大小的结构中的 string 字段到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二进制模式下Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，但出现一些异常。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式与不同的规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续; 从磁盘读取所有变量也就是说，而不填充记录之间。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FileGet`的只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 未不读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 读取不是元素的结构不需要双字节长度说明符的可变长度字符串。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于已在字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过使用从文件读取`FileGet`函数需要`Read`从访问枚举。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FileGet (int FileNumber, ref DateTime Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FileGet(int32 FileNumber, valuetype System.DateTime& Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FileGet (FileNumber As Integer, ByRef Value As DateTime, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FileGet : int * * int64 -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: Valid variable name into which data is read.

span.span: Valid variable name into which data is read.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which reading starts.

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which reading starts.

summary.span: Reads data from an open disk file into a variable.

span.span: Reads data from an open disk file into a variable.

summary.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGet` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FileGet` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 数据读取`FileGet`通常写入到的文件`FilePut`。Data read with `FileGet` is usually written to a file with `FilePut`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步的记录或最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数 (或指向由最后一个`Seek`函数) 读取。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte following the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function) is read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在从文件读取时，不要根据文件扩展名的文件的内容的相关的决策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 Form1.vb 文件可能不是 Visual Basic 源文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## 随机模式Random Mode 打开的文件中`Random`模式下，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果正在读取的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FileGet`读取的记录长度边界上的后续记录。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function,`FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 将文件缓冲区的现有内容，则填充一个记录的结尾和开始下一条记录之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因为无法任何明确地确定填充的数据量，它通常是具有匹配的数据被读取的长度的记录长度一个好办法。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 默认情况下，如果读入的变量是一个字符串，`FileGet`读取包含字符串长度，然后读放入变量的数据的两个字节描述符。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本支持的固定长度字符串;当放到文件，则不写入长度描述符。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果你想要读取的字符串没有说明符，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并且读取到应正确长度的字符串。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果读入的变量是一个数组，你可以选择是否要读取的大小和数组的维度属性的描述符。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在读取数组时，必须以匹配写入数组的方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果它使用描述符编写的必须读取描述符。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果不使用说明符的大小和数组的边界传递给`FileGet`确定要读取的内容。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述符指定的秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 + 8 倍的维数: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，下面的数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. `RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续; 从磁盘读取所有变量也就是说，而不填充记录之间。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FileGet`的只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 未不读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 读取不是元素的结构不需要双字节长度说明符的可变长度字符串。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于已在字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过使用从文件读取`FileGet`函数需要`Read`从访问枚举。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

Public Sub FileGet (FileNumber As Integer, ByRef Value As Double, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FileGet : int * * int64 -> unit

param.span: Valid variable name into which data is read.

span.span: Valid variable name into which data is read.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which reading starts.

summary.span: Reads data from an open disk file into a variable.

span.span: Reads data from an open disk file into a variable.

summary.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGet` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FileGet` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 数据读取`FileGet`通过使用通常写入到文件`FilePut`。Data read with `FileGet` is usually written to a file by using `FilePut`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步的记录或最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数 (或指向由最后一个`Seek`函数) 读取。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte following the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function) is read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在从文件读取时，不要根据文件扩展名的文件的内容的相关的决策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 Form1.vb 文件可能不是 Visual Basic 源文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## 随机模式Random Mode 打开的文件中`Random`模式下，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果正在读取的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FileGet`读取的记录长度边界上的后续记录。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 将文件缓冲区的现有内容，则填充一个记录的结尾和开始下一条记录之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因为无法任何明确地确定填充的数据量，它通常是具有匹配的数据被读取的长度的记录长度一个好办法。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 默认情况下，如果读入的变量是一个字符串，`FileGet`读取包含字符串长度，然后读放入变量的数据的两个字节描述符。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本支持的固定长度字符串;当放到文件，则不写入长度描述符。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果你想要读取的字符串没有说明符，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并且读取到应正确长度的字符串。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果读入的变量是一个数组，你可以选择是否要读取的大小和数组的维度属性的描述符。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在读取数组时，必须以匹配写入数组的方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果它使用描述符编写的必须读取描述符。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果不使用说明符的大小和数组的边界传递给`FileGet`确定要读取的内容。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述符指定的秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 + 8 倍的维数: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，下面的数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 分发了 218 个字节，如下所示：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述符 18 个字节: (2 + 8 \* 2)18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200 字节的数据: (5 * 10 * 4)。200 bytes for the data: (5 * 10 * 4). - 如果读入变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FileGet`读取仅变量的数据。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于所读取的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 中读取结构的元素，每个已分别读取的只不过没有元素之间没有空白。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁盘上，用户定义类型的动态数组 (使用编写`FilePut`) 通过其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍维度数的描述符的前缀: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于进行读取的各个元素所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 这包括任何数组和其描述符。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于以指示时写入字符串的大小的结构中的 string 字段到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二进制模式下Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，但出现一些异常。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式与不同的规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续; 从磁盘读取所有变量也就是说，而不填充记录之间。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FileGet`的只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 未不读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 读取不是元素的结构不需要双字节长度说明符的可变长度字符串。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于已在字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过使用从文件读取`FileGet`函数需要`Read`从访问枚举。Reading from a file by using the`FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGet` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FileGet` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 数据读取`FileGet`通过使用通常写入到文件`FilePut`。Data read with `FileGet` is usually written to a file by using `FilePut`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步的记录或最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数 (或指向由最后一个`Seek`函数) 读取。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte following the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function) is read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在从文件读取时，不要根据文件扩展名的文件的内容的相关的决策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 Form1.vb 文件可能不是 Visual Basic 源文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## 随机模式Random Mode 打开的文件中`Random`模式下，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果正在读取的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FileGet`读取的记录长度边界上的后续记录。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 将文件缓冲区的现有内容，则填充一个记录的结尾和开始下一条记录之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因为无法任何明确地确定填充的数据量，它通常是具有匹配的数据被读取的长度的记录长度一个好办法。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 默认情况下，如果读入的变量是一个字符串，`FileGet`读取包含字符串长度，然后读放入变量的数据的两个字节描述符。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本支持的固定长度字符串;当放到文件，则不写入长度描述符。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果你想要读取的字符串没有说明符，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并且读取到应正确长度的字符串。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果读入的变量是一个数组，你可以选择是否要读取的大小和数组的维度属性的描述符。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在读取数组时，必须以匹配写入数组的方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果它使用描述符编写的必须读取描述符。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果不使用说明符的大小和数组的边界传递给`FileGet`确定要读取的内容。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述符指定的秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 + 8 倍的维数: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，下面的数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 分发了 218 个字节，如下所示：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述符 18 个字节: (2 + 8 \* 2)18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200 字节的数据: (5 * 10 * 4)。200 bytes for the data: (5 * 10 * 4). - 如果读入变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FileGet`读取仅变量的数据。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于所读取的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 中读取结构的元素，每个已分别读取的只不过没有元素之间没有空白。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁盘上，用户定义类型的动态数组 (使用编写`FilePut`) 通过其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍维度数的描述符的前缀: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于进行读取的各个元素所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 这包括任何数组和其描述符。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于以指示时写入字符串的大小的结构中的 string 字段到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二进制模式下Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，但出现一些异常。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式与不同的规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续; 从磁盘读取所有变量也就是说，而不填充记录之间。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FileGet`的只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 未不读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 读取不是元素的结构不需要双字节长度说明符的可变长度字符串。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于已在字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过使用从文件读取`FileGet`函数需要`Read`从访问枚举。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FileGet (int FileNumber, ref long Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FileGet(int32 FileNumber, int64& Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FileGet (FileNumber As Integer, ByRef Value As Long, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FileGet : int * * int64 -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: Valid variable name into which data is read.

span.span: Valid variable name into which data is read.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which reading starts.

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which reading starts.

summary.span: Reads data from an open disk file into a variable.

span.span: Reads data from an open disk file into a variable.

summary.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: For more information, see .

`FileGet` 中读取结构的元素，每个已分别读取的只不过没有元素之间没有空白。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁盘上，用户定义类型的动态数组 (使用编写`FilePut`) 通过其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍维度数的描述符的前缀: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于进行读取的各个元素所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 这包括任何数组和其描述符。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于以指示时写入字符串的大小的结构中的 string 字段到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二进制模式下Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，但出现一些异常。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式与不同的规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续; 从磁盘读取所有变量也就是说，而不填充记录之间。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FileGet`的只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 未不读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 读取不是元素的结构不需要双字节长度说明符的可变长度字符串。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于已在字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过使用从文件读取`FileGet`函数需要`Read`从访问枚举。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGet` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FileGet` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 数据读取`FileGet`通过使用通常写入到文件`FilePut`。Data read with `FileGet` is usually written to a file by using `FilePut`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步的记录或最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数 (或指向由最后一个`Seek`函数) 读取。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte following the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function) is read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在从文件读取时，不要根据文件扩展名的文件的内容的相关的决策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 Form1.vb 文件可能不是 Visual Basic 源文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## 随机模式Random Mode 打开的文件中`Random`模式下，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果正在读取的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FileGet`读取的记录长度边界上的后续记录。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 将文件缓冲区的现有内容，则填充一个记录的结尾和开始下一条记录之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因为无法任何明确地确定填充的数据量，它通常是具有匹配的数据被读取的长度的记录长度一个好办法。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 默认情况下，如果读入的变量是一个字符串，`FileGet`读取包含字符串长度，然后读放入变量的数据的两个字节描述符。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本支持的固定长度字符串;当放到文件，则不写入长度描述符。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果你想要读取的字符串没有说明符，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并且读取到应正确长度的字符串。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果读入的变量是一个数组，你可以选择是否要读取的大小和数组的维度属性的描述符。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在读取数组时，必须以匹配写入数组的方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果它使用描述符编写的必须读取描述符。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果不使用说明符的大小和数组的边界传递给`FileGet`确定要读取的内容。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述符指定的秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 + 8 倍的维数: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，下面的数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 分发了 218 个字节，如下所示：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述符 18 个字节: (2 + 8 \* 2)18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200 字节的数据: (5 * 10 * 4)。200 bytes for the data: (5 * 10 * 4). - 如果读入变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FileGet`读取仅变量的数据。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于所读取的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 中读取结构的元素，每个已分别读取的只不过没有元素之间没有空白。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁盘上，用户定义类型的动态数组 (使用编写`FilePut`) 通过其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍维度数的描述符的前缀: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于进行读取的各个元素所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 这包括任何数组和其描述符。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于以指示时写入字符串的大小的结构中的 string 字段到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二进制模式下Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，但出现一些异常。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式与不同的规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续; 从磁盘读取所有变量也就是说，而不填充记录之间。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FileGet`的只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 未不读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 读取不是元素的结构不需要双字节长度说明符的可变长度字符串。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于已在字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过使用从文件读取`FileGet`函数需要`Read`从访问枚举。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGet` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FileGet` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 数据读取`FileGet`通过使用通常写入到文件`FilePut`。Data read with `FileGet` is usually written to a file by using `FilePut`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步的记录或最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数 (或指向由最后一个`Seek`函数) 读取。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte following the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function) is read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在从文件读取时，不要根据文件扩展名的文件的内容的相关的决策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 Form1.vb 文件可能不是 Visual Basic 源文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## 随机模式Random Mode 打开的文件中`Random`模式下，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果正在读取的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FileGet`读取的记录长度边界上的后续记录。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 将文件缓冲区的现有内容，则填充一个记录的结尾和开始下一条记录之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the starting of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因为无法任何明确地确定填充的数据量，它通常是具有匹配的数据被读取的长度的记录长度一个好办法。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 默认情况下，如果读入的变量是一个字符串，`FileGet`读取包含字符串长度，然后读放入变量的数据的两个字节描述符。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本支持的固定长度字符串;当放到文件，则不写入长度描述符。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果你想要读取的字符串没有说明符，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并且读取到应正确长度的字符串。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果读入的变量是一个数组，你可以选择是否要读取的大小和数组的维度属性的描述符。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在读取数组时，必须以匹配写入数组的方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果它使用描述符编写的必须读取描述符。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果不使用说明符的大小和数组的边界传递给`FileGet`确定要读取的内容。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述符指定的秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 + 8 倍的维数: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，下面的数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 分发了 218 个字节，如下所示：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述符 18 个字节: (2 + 8 \* 2)18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200 字节的数据: (5 * 10 * 4)。200 bytes for the data: (5 * 10 * 4). - 如果读入变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FileGet`读取仅变量的数据。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于所读取的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 中读取结构的元素，每个已分别读取的只不过没有元素之间没有空白。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁盘上，用户定义类型的动态数组 (使用编写`FilePut`) 通过其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍维度数的描述符的前缀: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于进行读取的各个元素所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 这包括任何数组和其描述符。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于以指示时写入字符串的大小的结构中的 string 字段到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二进制模式下Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，但出现一些异常。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式与不同的规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续; 从磁盘读取所有变量也就是说，而不填充记录之间。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FileGet`的只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 未不读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 读取不是元素的结构不需要双字节长度说明符的可变长度字符串。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于已在字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过使用从文件读取`FileGet`函数需要`Read`从访问枚举。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGetObject`而不是使用函数`FileGet`以避免多义性在编译时，如果类型`Object`会返回而不是另一个类型，如`Integer`， `Long`， `Short`，依次类推。The `FileGetObject` function is used instead of `FileGet` to avoid ambiguities at compile time if type `Object` is returned instead of another type, such as `Integer`, `Long`, `Short`, and so forth. 如果你想要写出`Variant`类型，`FileGetObject`是必需的。If you intend to write out the `Variant` type, `FileGetObject` is required. 当有疑问时，如果第二个参数使用一个对象，它始终建议你使用`FilePutObject`和`FileGetObject`。When in doubt, if you are using an object for the second parameter, it is always suggested that you use `FilePutObject` and `FileGetObject`. `FileGetObject` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FileGetObject` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 数据读取`FileGetObject`通常使用编写`FilePutObject`。Data read with `FileGetObject` is usually written with `FilePutObject`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`，`FileGetObject`上次读取的记录或字节`FileGetObject`或`FilePutObject`函数 (或指向由最后一个`Seek`函数)。If you omit `RecordNumber`, `FileGetObject` reads the record or byte after the last `FileGetObject` or `FilePutObject` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function). ## 随机模式Random Mode 打开的文件中`Random`模式下，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果正在读取的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FileGetObject`读取的记录长度边界上的后续记录。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGetObject` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 将文件缓冲区的现有内容，则填充一个记录的结尾和开头的下一条记录之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the beginning of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因为无法精确地确定填充的数据量，最好具有匹配的数据被读取的长度的记录长度。Because the amount of padding data cannot be precisely determined, it is a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 如果读入的变量是一个字符串，默认情况下的`FileGetObject`读取包含字符串长度的两个字节描述符，然后读取放入变量的数据。If the variable being read into is a string, by default `FileGetObject` reads a two-byte descriptor containing the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本支持固定长度字符串和读取到文件时，则不会写入长度描述符。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings and when read to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果你想要读取的字符串没有说明符，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并且读取到应正确长度的字符串。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果读入的变量为数组，则 `RecordLength` 函数中 `FileOpen` 参数指定的记录长度必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。If the variable being read into is an array, then the record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 描述符指定的秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 + 8 时间维度数： 2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: 2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions. 例如，下面的数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘：For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#27](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#27)] 分发了 218 个字节，如下所示：为描述符分发了 18 个字节 (2 + 8 \* 2)，为数据分发了 100 个字节 (5 \* 10 \* 4)。The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: 18 bytes for the descriptor (2 + 8 \* 2), and 100 bytes for the data (5 \* 10 \* 4). - `FileGetObject` 中读取结构的元素，每个已分别读取的只不过没有元素之间没有空白。`FileGetObject` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁盘上，用户定义类型的动态数组 (使用编写`FilePutObject`) 通过其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍维度数的描述符的前缀： 2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePutObject`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: 2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于进行读取的各个元素，包括任何数组和其描述符所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements, including any arrays and their descriptors. 类可以应用于以指示字符串写入时的大小的结构中的 string 字段到磁盘。The class can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of string when written to disk. ## 二进制模式下Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，所有的`Random`规则适用，但存在下列例外：For files opened in `Binary` mode, all of the `Random` rules apply, with these exceptions: - `RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGetObject` 读取所有变量从磁盘连续，即记录之间没有空白。`FileGetObject` reads all variables from disk contiguously, that is, with no padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FileGetObject`的只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGetObject` reads only the data. 未不读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. `FileGetObject` 读取不是元素的结构不需要双字节长度说明符的可变长度字符串。`FileGetObject` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于已在字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在从文件读取时，不要根据文件扩展名的文件的内容的相关的决策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 Form1.vb 文件可能不是 Visual Basic 源文件。For example, a file named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## Examples 下面的示例读入测试文件中读取一条记录，然后检索它。The following example reads a record into a test file and then retrieves it. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#26)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的文件打开时`FileLen`被调用函数时，它已打开时，返回的值表示文件的大小。If the specified file is open when the `FileLen` function is called, the value returned represents the size of the file at the time it was opened. > [!NOTE] > 若要获取的当前打开的文件的长度，请使用`LOF`函数。To obtain the current length of an open file, use the `LOF` function. ## Examples 此示例使用`FileLen`函数以返回文件的长度以字节为单位。This example uses the `FileLen` function to return the length of a file in bytes. 在此示例中，假定`TestFile`是包含一些数据的文件。For purposes of this example, assume that `TestFile` is a file that contains some data. remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileOpen`函数提供用于向后兼容性，并且可能会影响性能。The `FileOpen` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧式应用程序，`My.Computer.FileSystem`对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Visual Basic 文件访问](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). 可以对其执行任何 I/O 操作之前，必须打开文件。You must open a file before any I/O operation can be performed on it. `FileOpen` 针对 I/O 分配缓冲区，文件并确定要用于缓冲区的访问模式。`FileOpen` allocates a buffer for I/O to the file and determines the mode of access to use with the buffer. > [!IMPORTANT] > 写入到文件时，应用程序可能需要创建一个文件，如果尝试写入的文件不存在。When writing to a file, an application may have to create a file, if the file to which it is trying to write does not exist. 为此，它将用用于创建文件的目录中需要的权限。To do so, it needs permission for the directory in which the file is to be created. 但是，如果指定的文件`FileName`确实存在，应用程序需求`Write`仅指向文件本身的权限。However, if the file specified by `FileName` does exist, the application needs `Write` permission only to the file itself. 可能有助于提高安全性，部署和授予期间创建文件的任何位置`Write`对该文件的权限仅，而不是整个目录。Wherever possible, to help improve security, create the file during deployment and grant `Write` permission to that file only, instead of to the whole directory. 为了提高安全性，请将数据写入到的根目录或 Program Files 目录的用户目录而不是。To help improve security, write data to user directories instead of to the root directory or the Program Files directory. 若要打开的通道可通过使用找到`FreeFile()`函数。The channel to open can be found by using the `FreeFile()` function. > [!IMPORTANT] > `FileOpen`函数需要`Read`从访问`FileIOPermissionAccess`枚举，从而可能影响在部分信任情况下其执行。The `FileOpen` function requires `Read` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration, which may affect its execution in partial trust situations. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see enumeration. ## Examples 此示例演示如何的各种用法`FileOpen`函数，以使输入和输出到文件。This example illustrates various uses of the `FileOpen` function to enable input and output to a file. 下面的代码中打开的文件`TestFile`中`Input`模式。The following code opens the file `TestFile` in `Input` mode. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#5)] 此示例打开中的文件`Binary`进行只写操作的模式。This example opens the file in `Binary` mode for writing operations only. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 下面的示例打开中的文件`Random`模式。The following example opens the file in `Random` mode. 该文件包含的记录是结构`Person`。The file contains records of the structure `Person`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#7)] 此代码示例将打开的文件中`Output`模式; 任何进程可以读取或写入文件。This code example opens the file in `Output` mode; any process can read or write to file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#8)] 此代码示例将打开的文件中`Binary`模式供读取，则其他进程无法读取文件。This code example opens the file in `Binary` mode for reading; other processes cannot read file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 通常使用 `FileGet` 从文件中读取使用 `FilePut` 编写的数据。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一个记录或后的最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数或由最后一个指向`Seek`编写函数。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`参数控制是否函数将字符串解释为变量或固定长度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 如果参数为本身不会写入长度描述符`True`。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果你使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`与`FilePut`，您需要做相同，但有`FileGet`，并且你必须确保此字符串初始化为所需的长度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 随机模式Random Mode 打开的文件中`Random`模式下，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果要写入的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FilePut`将后续记录写入记录长度边界上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 将文件缓冲区的现有内容，则填充一个记录的结尾和开始下一条记录之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因为无法任何明确地确定填充的数据量，它通常是具有要写入的数据长度相匹配的记录长度一个好办法。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果要写入的数据的长度大于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，将引发异常。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果写入的变量是一个字符串，`FilePut`将写入两个字节说明符，包含了字符串长度，然后写入放入变量的数据。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 写入的变量是否包含数值类型的对象`FilePut`写入两个字节以标识`VarType`的对象，然后将该变量。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 例如，当编写一个对象时，包含一个整数，`FilePut`写入 6 个字节： 标识作为对象的两个字节`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 包含的数据的四个字节。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于实际存储变量所需的字节数。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果写入的变量是一个对象，包含一个字符串，`FilePut`先写入两个字节说明符标识`VarType(8)`的对象，然后。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少为四个字节大于字符串的实际长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果你想要放入而无需描述符字符串，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并且读取到应正确长度的字符串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果写入的变量是一个数组，则必须选择要写入的大小和数组的维度的属性的描述符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本编写的文件描述符为动态数组而不是固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不能写描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 当编写数组，你必须相匹配的方法将读取的数组;如果将具有描述符读取，你必须编写描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定的秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 + 8 倍的维数: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，下面的数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FilePut`将变量的数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 将元素的结构写入就像分别，写入的每个元素之间没有空白的情况除外。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于以指示写入的字符串的大小的结构中的 string 字段到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 字符串具有更多个字节，超过指定值的字段`VBFixedString`属性会被截断时写入到磁盘，String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式下Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，但出现一些异常。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式与不同的规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 将所有变量磁盘连续，即包含无记录之间的填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FilePut`只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 未不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 写入不是元素的结构没有两个字节长度说明符的可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，以下语句将 11 个字节写入文件号 1:For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 通过使用对文件进行写入`FilePut`函数需要`Write`从访问枚举。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用`FilePut`函数以将数据写入到文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 结构的 5 个记录`Person`写入到文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]
