remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 通常使用 `FileGet` 从文件中读取使用 `FilePut` 编写的数据。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一个记录或后的最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数或由最后一个指向`Seek`编写函数。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`参数控制是否函数将字符串解释为变量或固定长度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 如果参数为本身不会写入长度描述符`True`。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果你使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`与`FilePut`，您需要做相同，但有`FileGet`，并且你必须确保此字符串初始化为所需的长度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 随机模式Random Mode 打开的文件中`Random`模式下，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果要写入的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FilePut`将后续记录写入记录长度边界上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 将文件缓冲区的现有内容，则填充一个记录的结尾和开始下一条记录之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因为无法任何明确地确定填充的数据量，它通常是具有要写入的数据长度相匹配的记录长度一个好办法。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果要写入的数据的长度大于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，将引发异常。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果写入的变量是一个字符串，`FilePut`将写入两个字节说明符，包含了字符串长度，然后写入放入变量的数据。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 写入的变量是否包含数值类型的对象`FilePut`写入两个字节以标识`VarType`的对象，然后将该变量。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 例如，当编写一个对象时，包含一个整数，`FilePut`写入 6 个字节： 标识作为对象的两个字节`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 包含的数据的四个字节。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于实际存储变量所需的字节数。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果写入的变量是一个对象，包含一个字符串，`FilePut`先写入两个字节说明符标识`VarType(8)`的对象，然后。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少为四个字节大于字符串的实际长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果你想要放入而无需描述符字符串，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并且读取到应正确长度的字符串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果写入的变量是一个数组，则必须选择要写入的大小和数组的维度的属性的描述符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本编写的文件描述符为动态数组而不是固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不能写描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 当编写数组，你必须相匹配的方法将读取的数组;如果将具有描述符读取，你必须编写描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定的秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 + 8 倍的维数: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，下面的数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FilePut`将变量的数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 将元素的结构写入就像分别，写入的每个元素之间没有空白的情况除外。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于以指示写入的字符串的大小的结构中的 string 字段到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 字符串具有更多个字节，超过指定值的字段`VBFixedString`属性会被截断时写入到磁盘，String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式下Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，但出现一些异常。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式与不同的规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 将所有变量磁盘连续，即包含无记录之间的填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FilePut`只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 未不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 写入不是元素的结构没有两个字节长度说明符的可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，以下语句将 11 个字节写入文件号 1:For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 通过使用对文件进行写入`FilePut`函数需要`Write`从访问枚举。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用`FilePut`函数以将数据写入到文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 结构的 5 个记录`Person`写入到文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePut (int FileNumber, DateTime Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, valuetype System.DateTime Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Integer, Value As DateTime, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FilePut : int * DateTime * int64 -> unit

param.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

summary.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 通常使用 `FileGet` 从文件中读取使用 `FilePut` 编写的数据。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一个记录或后的最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数或由最后一个指向`Seek`编写函数。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`参数控制是否函数将字符串解释为变量或固定长度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 如果参数为本身不会写入长度描述符`True`。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果你使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`与`FilePut`，您需要做相同，但有`FileGet`，并且你必须确保此字符串初始化为所需的长度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 随机模式Random Mode 打开的文件中`Random`模式下，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果要写入的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FilePut`将后续记录写入记录长度边界上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 将文件缓冲区的现有内容，则填充一个记录的结尾和开始下一条记录之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因为无法任何明确地确定填充的数据量，它通常是具有要写入的数据长度相匹配的记录长度一个好办法。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果要写入的数据的长度大于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，将引发异常。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果写入的变量是一个字符串，`FilePut`将写入两个字节说明符，包含了字符串长度，然后写入放入变量的数据。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 写入的变量是否包含数值类型的对象`FilePut`写入两个字节以标识`VarType`的对象，然后将该变量。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 例如，当编写一个对象时，包含一个整数，`FilePut`写入 6 个字节： 标识作为对象的两个字节`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 包含的数据的四个字节。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于实际存储变量所需的字节数。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果写入的变量是一个对象，包含一个字符串，`FilePut`先写入两个字节说明符标识`VarType(8)`的对象，然后。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少为四个字节大于字符串的实际长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果你想要放入而无需描述符字符串，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并且读取到应正确长度的字符串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果写入的变量是一个数组，则必须选择要写入的大小和数组的维度的属性的描述符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本编写的文件描述符为动态数组而不是固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不能写描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 当编写数组，你必须相匹配的方法将读取的数组;如果将具有描述符读取，你必须编写描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定的秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 + 8 倍的维数: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，下面的数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FilePut`将变量的数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 将元素的结构写入就像分别，写入的每个元素之间没有空白的情况除外。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于以指示写入的字符串的大小的结构中的 string 字段到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 字符串具有更多个字节，超过指定值的字段`VBFixedString`属性会被截断时写入到磁盘，String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式下Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，但出现一些异常。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式与不同的规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 将所有变量磁盘连续，即包含无记录之间的填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FilePut`只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 未不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 写入不是元素的结构没有两个字节长度说明符的可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，以下语句将 11 个字节写入文件号 1:For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 通过使用对文件进行写入`FilePut`函数需要`Write`从访问枚举。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用`FilePut`函数以将数据写入到文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 结构的 5 个记录`Person`写入到文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Integer, Value As Double, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)

param.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

summary.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 通常使用 `FileGet` 从文件中读取使用 `FilePut` 编写的数据。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一个记录或后的最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数或由最后一个指向`Seek`编写函数。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`参数控制是否函数将字符串解释为变量或固定长度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 如果参数为本身不会写入长度描述符`True`。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果你使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`与`FilePut`，您需要做相同，但有`FileGet`，并且你必须确保此字符串初始化为所需的长度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 随机模式Random Mode 打开的文件中`Random`模式下，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果要写入的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FilePut`将后续记录写入记录长度边界上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 将文件缓冲区的现有内容，则填充一个记录的结尾和开始下一条记录之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因为无法任何明确地确定填充的数据量，它通常是具有要写入的数据长度相匹配的记录长度一个好办法。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果要写入的数据的长度大于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，将引发异常。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果写入的变量是一个字符串，`FilePut`将写入两个字节说明符，包含了字符串长度，然后写入放入变量的数据。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 写入的变量是否包含数值类型的对象`FilePut`写入两个字节以标识`VarType`的对象，然后将该变量。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 例如，当编写一个对象时，包含一个整数，`FilePut`写入 6 个字节： 标识作为对象的两个字节`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 包含的数据的四个字节。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于实际存储变量所需的字节数。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果写入的变量是一个对象，包含一个字符串，`FilePut`先写入两个字节说明符标识`VarType(8)`的对象，然后。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the`VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少为四个字节大于字符串的实际长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果你想要放入而无需描述符字符串，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并且读取到应正确长度的字符串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果写入的变量是一个数组，则必须选择要写入的大小和数组的维度的属性的描述符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本编写的文件描述符为动态数组而不是固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不能写描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 当编写数组，你必须相匹配的方法将读取的数组;如果将具有描述符读取，你必须编写描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定的秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 + 8 倍的维数: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，下面的数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FilePut`将变量的数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 将元素的结构写入就像分别，写入的每个元素之间没有空白的情况除外。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于以指示写入的字符串的大小的结构中的 string 字段到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 字符串具有更多个字节，超过指定值的字段`VBFixedString`属性会被截断时写入到磁盘，String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式下Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，但出现一些异常。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式与不同的规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 将所有变量磁盘连续，即包含无记录之间的填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FilePut`只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 未不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 写入不是元素的结构没有两个字节长度说明符的可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，以下语句将 11 个字节写入文件号 1:For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 通过使用对文件进行写入`FilePut`函数需要`Write`从访问枚举。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用`FilePut`函数以将数据写入到文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 结构的 5 个记录`Person`写入到文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePut (int FileNumber, int Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, int32 Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Integer, Value As Integer, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FilePut : int * int * int64 -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

summary.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 通常使用 `FileGet` 从文件中读取使用 `FilePut` 编写的数据。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一个记录或后的最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数或由最后一个指向`Seek`编写函数。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`参数控制是否函数将字符串解释为变量或固定长度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 如果参数为本身不会写入长度描述符`True`。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果你使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`与`FilePut`，您需要做相同，但有`FileGet`，并且你必须确保此字符串初始化为所需的长度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 随机模式Random Mode 打开的文件中`Random`模式下，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果要写入的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FilePut`将后续记录写入记录长度边界上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 将文件缓冲区的现有内容，则填充一个记录的结尾和开始下一条记录之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因为无法任何明确地确定填充的数据量，它通常是具有要写入的数据长度相匹配的记录长度一个好办法。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果要写入的数据的长度大于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，将引发异常。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果写入的变量是一个字符串，`FilePut`将写入两个字节说明符，包含了字符串长度，然后写入放入变量的数据。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 写入的变量是否包含数值类型的对象`FilePut`写入两个字节以标识`VarType`的对象，然后将该变量。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 例如，当编写一个对象时，包含一个整数，`FilePut`写入 6 个字节： 标识作为对象的两个字节`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 包含的数据的四个字节。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于实际存储变量所需的字节数。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果写入的变量是一个对象，包含一个字符串，`FilePut`先写入两个字节说明符标识`VarType(8)`的对象，然后。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少为四个字节大于字符串的实际长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果你想要放入而无需描述符字符串，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并且读取到应正确长度的字符串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果写入的变量是一个数组，则必须选择要写入的大小和数组的维度的属性的描述符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本编写的文件描述符为动态数组而不是固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不能写描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 当编写数组，你必须相匹配的方法将读取的数组;如果将具有描述符读取，你必须编写描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定的秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 + 8 倍的维数: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，下面的数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FilePut`将变量的数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 将元素的结构写入就像分别，写入的每个元素之间没有空白的情况除外。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于以指示写入的字符串的大小的结构中的 string 字段到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 字符串具有更多个字节，超过指定值的字段`VBFixedString`属性会被截断时写入到磁盘，String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式下Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，但出现一些异常。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式与不同的规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 将所有变量磁盘连续，即包含无记录之间的填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FilePut`只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 未不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 写入不是元素的结构没有两个字节长度说明符的可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，以下语句将 11 个字节写入文件号 1:For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 通过使用对文件进行写入`FilePut`函数需要`Write`从访问枚举。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用`FilePut`函数以将数据写入到文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 结构的 5 个记录`Person`写入到文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePut (int FileNumber, float Value, long RecordNumber = -1);

Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Integer, Value As Single, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FilePut : int * single * int64 -> unit

param.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

summary.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 通常使用 `FileGet` 从文件中读取使用 `FilePut` 编写的数据。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一个记录或后的最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数或由最后一个指向`Seek`编写函数。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`参数控制是否函数将字符串解释为变量或固定长度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 如果参数为本身不会写入长度描述符`True`。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果你使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`与`FilePut`，您需要做相同，但有`FileGet`，并且你必须确保此字符串初始化为所需的长度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 随机模式Random Mode 打开的文件中`Random`模式下，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果要写入的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FilePut`将后续记录写入记录长度边界上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the`RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 将文件缓冲区的现有内容，则填充一个记录的结尾和开始下一条记录之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因为无法任何明确地确定填充的数据量，它通常是具有要写入的数据长度相匹配的记录长度一个好办法。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果要写入的数据的长度大于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，将引发异常。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果写入的变量是一个字符串，`FilePut`将写入两个字节说明符，包含了字符串长度，然后写入放入变量的数据。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 写入的变量是否包含数值类型的对象`FilePut`写入两个字节以标识`VarType`的对象，然后将该变量。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 例如，当编写一个对象时，包含一个整数，`FilePut`写入 6 个字节： 标识作为对象的两个字节`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 包含的数据的四个字节。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于实际存储变量所需的字节数。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果写入的变量是一个对象，包含一个字符串，`FilePut`先写入两个字节说明符标识`VarType(8)`的对象，然后。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少为四个字节大于字符串的实际长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果你想要放入而无需描述符字符串，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并且读取到应正确长度的字符串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果写入的变量是一个数组，则必须选择要写入的大小和数组的维度的属性的描述符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本编写的文件描述符为动态数组而不是固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不能写描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 当编写数组，你必须相匹配的方法将读取的数组;如果将具有描述符读取，你必须编写描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定的秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 + 8 倍的维数: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，下面的数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FilePut`将变量的数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 将元素的结构写入就像分别，写入的每个元素之间没有空白的情况除外。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于以指示写入的字符串的大小的结构中的 string 字段到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 字符串具有更多个字节，超过指定值的字段`VBFixedString`属性会被截断时写入到磁盘，String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式下Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，但出现一些异常。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式与不同的规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 将所有变量磁盘连续，即包含无记录之间的填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FilePut`只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 未不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 写入不是元素的结构没有两个字节长度说明符的可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，以下语句将 11 个字节写入文件号 1:For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 通过使用对文件进行写入`FilePut`函数需要`Write`从访问枚举。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用`FilePut`函数以将数据写入到文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 结构的 5 个记录`Person`写入到文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePut (object FileNumber, object Value, object RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FilePut(object FileNumber, object Value, object RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Object, Value As Object, Optional RecordNumber As Object = -1)
static member FilePut : obj * obj * obj -> unit

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This member has been deprecated. Please use FilePutObject to write Object types, or coerce FileNumber and RecordNumber to Integer for writing non-Object types. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

param.name: Value
param.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

summary.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 通常使用 `FileGet` 从文件中读取使用 `FilePut` 编写的数据。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一个记录或后的最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数或由最后一个指向`Seek`编写函数。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`参数控制是否函数将字符串解释为变量或固定长度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 如果参数为本身不会写入长度描述符`True`。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果你使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`与`FilePut`，您需要做相同，但有`FileGet`，并且你必须确保此字符串初始化为所需的长度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 随机模式Random Mode 打开的文件中`Random`模式下，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果要写入的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FilePut`将后续记录写入记录长度边界上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 将文件缓冲区的现有内容，则填充一个记录的结尾和开始下一条记录之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因为无法任何明确地确定填充的数据量，它通常是具有要写入的数据长度相匹配的记录长度一个好办法。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果要写入的数据的长度大于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，将引发异常。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果写入的变量是一个字符串，`FilePut`将写入两个字节说明符，包含了字符串长度，然后写入放入变量的数据。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 写入的变量是否包含数值类型的对象`FilePut`写入两个字节以标识`VarType`的对象，然后将该变量。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 例如，当编写一个对象时，包含一个整数，`FilePut`写入 6 个字节： 标识作为对象的两个字节`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 包含的数据的四个字节。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于实际存储变量所需的字节数。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果写入的变量是一个对象，包含一个字符串，`FilePut`先写入两个字节说明符标识`VarType(8)`的对象，然后。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少为四个字节大于字符串的实际长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果你想要放入而无需描述符字符串，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并且读取到应正确长度的字符串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果写入的变量是一个数组，则必须选择要写入的大小和数组的维度的属性的描述符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本编写的文件描述符为动态数组而不是固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不能写描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 当编写数组，你必须相匹配的方法将读取的数组;如果将具有描述符读取，你必须编写描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定的秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 + 8 倍的维数: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，下面的数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FilePut`将变量的数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 将元素的结构写入就像分别，写入的每个元素之间没有空白的情况除外。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于以指示写入的字符串的大小的结构中的 string 字段到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 字符串具有更多个字节，超过指定值的字段`VBFixedString`属性会被截断时写入到磁盘，String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式下Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，但出现一些异常。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式与不同的规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 将所有变量磁盘连续，即包含无记录之间的填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FilePut`只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 未不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 写入不是元素的结构没有两个字节长度说明符的可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，以下语句将 11 个字节写入文件号 1:For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 通过使用对文件进行写入`FilePut`函数需要`Write`从访问枚举。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用`FilePut`函数以将数据写入到文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 结构的 5 个记录`Person`写入到文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

param.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.span: Applies only when writing an array.

span.span: Specifies whether the array is to be treated as dynamic, and whether to write an array descriptor for the string that describes the length.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePutObject`而不是使用函数`FilePut`以避免多义性在编译时，如果类型`Object`而不是另一个类型，如传递`Integer`， `Long`， `Short`，依次类推。The `FilePutObject` function is used instead of `FilePut` to avoid ambiguities at compile time if type `Object` is passed instead of another type, such as `Integer`, `Long`, `Short`, and so forth. `FilePutObject` 写入和读取描述对象的描述符。`FilePutObject` writes and reads descriptors that describe the object. 如果你想要写出`Variant`类型，`FilePutObject`是必需的。If you intend to write out the `Variant` type, `FilePutObject` is required. 当有疑问时，如果第二个参数使用一个对象，我们建议您始终使用`FilePutObject`和`FileGetObject`。When in doubt, if you are using an object for the second parameter, we recommend that you always use `FilePutObject` and `FileGetObject`. `FilePutObject` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FilePutObject` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 通常使用 `FileGetObject` 从文件中读取使用 `FilePutObject` 编写的数据。Data written with `FilePutObject` is usually read from a file by using `FileGetObject`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`，`FilePutObject`上次写入的下一步的记录或字节`FileGetObject`或`FilePutObject`函数 (或记录或字节指向由最后一个`Seek`函数)。If you omit `RecordNumber`, `FilePutObject` writes the next record or byte after the last `FileGetObject` or `FilePutObject` function (or the record or byte pointed to by the last `Seek` function). `StringIsFixedLength`参数控制是否函数将字符串解释为变量或固定长度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePutObject` 如果参数为本身不会写入长度描述符`True`。`FilePutObject` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果你使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`与`FilePutObject`，您需要做相同，但有`FileGetObject`，和你还必须确保此字符串初始化为所需的长度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePutObject`, you have to do the same with `FileGetObject`, and you must also make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 随机模式Random Mode 打开的文件中`Random`模式下，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果要写入的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FilePutObject`将后续记录写入记录长度边界上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePutObject` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 将文件缓冲区的现有内容，则填充一个记录的结尾和开始下一条记录之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因为无法精确地确定填充的数据量，它通常是具有要写入的数据长度相匹配的记录长度一个好办法。Because the amount of padding data cannot be precisely determined, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果要写入的数据的长度大于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，将引发异常。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception is thrown. - 写入的变量是否包含数值类型的对象`FilePutObject`写入两个字节以标识`VarType`的对象，然后将该变量。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePutObject` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 例如，当编写一个对象时，包含一个整数，`FilePutObject`写入 6 个字节： 标识作为对象的两个字节`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 包含的数据的四个字节。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePutObject` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于实际存储变量所需的字节数。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果写入的变量是一个对象，包含一个字符串，`FilePutObject`写入一个双字节说明符标识`VarType(8)`的对象，然后。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePutObject` writes a two-byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少为四个字节大于字符串的实际长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果你想要放入而无需描述符字符串，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并且读取到应正确长度的字符串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果写入的变量为数组，则 `RecordLength` 函数中 `FileOpen` 子句指定的记录长度必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。If the variable being written is an array, then the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 描述符指定的秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 + 8 倍的维数: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). ## 二进制模式下Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，所有`Random`模式规则适用，除外：For files opened in `Binary` mode, all the `Random` mode rules apply, except: - `RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePutObject` 将所有变量磁盘连续，即包含无记录之间的填充。`FilePutObject` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. ## Examples 此示例使用`FilePutObject`函数以向文件写入一个字符串。This example uses the `FilePutObject` function to write a string to a file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#54](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#54)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定设置了哪些属性，请使用`And`运算符执行返回的值的按位比较`GetAttr`函数和所需的各个文件属性的值。To determine which attributes are set, use the `And` operator to perform a bitwise comparison of the value returned by the `GetAttr` function and the value of the individual file attribute you want. 如果结果不为零，则该属性设置为指定的文件。If the result is not zero, that attribute is set for the named file. 例如，以下的返回值`And`表达式是零 if`Archive`未设置属性：For example, the return value of the following `And` expression is zero if the `Archive` attribute is not set: ```vb Result = GetAttr(FName) And vbArchive ``` 如果返回非零值`Archive`属性设置。A nonzero value is returned if the `Archive` attribute is set. ## Examples 此示例使用`GetAttr`函数来确定文件和目录或文件夹的属性。This example uses the `GetAttr` function to determine the attributes of a file and directory or folder. summary.span: Reads data from an open sequential file and assigns the data to variables.

span.span: Reads data from an open sequential file and assigns the data to variables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Input`函数提供用于向后兼容性，并且可能会影响性能。The `Input` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧式应用程序，`My.Computer.FileSystem`对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Visual Basic 文件访问](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). 数据读取`Input`通过使用通常写入到文件`Write`。Data read with `Input` is usually written to a file by using `Write`. 此函数只能用于的文件在打开`Input`或`Binary`模式。Use this function only with files opened in `Input` or `Binary` mode. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在从文件读取时，不要根据文件扩展名的文件的内容的相关的决策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of the file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 Form1.vb 文件可能不是 Visual Basic 2005 源文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic 2005 source file. 读取时，标准字符串或数值数据就赋给变量而不进行修改。When read, standard string or numeric data is assigned to variables without modification. 下表说明了如何处理其他输入的数据。The following table illustrates how other input data is treated. |数据Data|分配给变量的值Value assigned to variable| |-|-| |分隔逗号或空白的行Delimiting comma or blank line|空Empty| |#NULL ##NULL#|`DBNull`| |#TRUE # 或 #FALSE ##TRUE# or #FALSE#|`True` 或 `False``True` or `False`| |#`yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss`#|日期和/或表达式所表示的时间The date and/or time represented by the expression| |#ERROR `errornumber`##ERROR `errornumber`#|`errornumber` （变量是一个对象标记为错误）`errornumber` (variable is an object tagged as an error)| 如果在输入数据项时达到文件末尾，输入已停止，则会出错。If you reach the end of the file while you are inputting a data item, the input is stopped and an error occurs. > [!NOTE] > `Input`函数未进行本地化。The `Input` function is not localized. 例如，在德国的版本中，如果输入 3,14159，则返回仅 3，因为逗号将被视为变量分隔符而不是作为小数点。For example, in the German version, if you input 3,14159, it returns only 3, because the comma is treated as a variable separator instead of as a decimal point. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过使用从文件读取`Input`函数需要`Read`从访问`FileIOPermissionAccess`枚举。Reading from a file by using the `Input` function requires `Read` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用`Input`函数来从文件读取数据，到两个变量。This example uses the `Input` function to read data from a file into two variables. 此示例假定`TestFile`是具有某些行写入到它使用的数据的文件`Write`函数，每行都包含在引用和大量分隔用逗号进行分隔，例如字符串: ("Hello"，234)。This example assumes that `TestFile` is a file that has some lines of data written to it using the `Write` function, each line containing a string in quotations and a number separated by a comma, for example: ("Hello", 234). [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#35)]

或 #FALSE ##TRUE# or #FALSE#|`True` 或 `False``True` or `False`| |#`yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss`#|日期和/或表达式所表示的时间The date and/or time represented by the expression| |#ERROR `errornumber`##ERROR `errornumber`#|`errornumber` （变量是一个对象标记为错误）`errornumber` (variable is an object tagged as an error)| 如果在输入数据项时达到文件末尾，输入已停止，则会出错。If you reach the end of the file while you are inputting a data item, the input is stopped and an error occurs. > [!NOTE] > `Input`函数未进行本地化。The `Input` function is not localized. 例如，在德国的版本中，如果输入 3,14159，则返回仅 3，因为逗号将被视为变量分隔符而不是作为小数点。For example, in the German version, if you input 3,14159, it returns only 3, because the comma is treated as a variable separator instead of as a decimal point. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过使用从文件读取`Input`函数需要`Read`从访问`FileIOPermissionAccess`枚举。Reading from a file by using the `Input` function requires `Read` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用`Input`函数来从文件读取数据，到两个变量。This example uses the `Input` function to read data from a file into two variables. 此示例假定`TestFile`是具有某些行写入到它使用的数据的文件`Write`函数，每行都包含在引用和大量分隔用逗号进行分隔，例如字符串: ("Hello"，234)。This example assumes that `TestFile` is a file that has some lines of data written to it using the `Write` function, each line containing a string in quotations and a number separated by a comma, for example: ("Hello", 234). remarks.format: ## Remarks `Input`函数提供用于向后兼容性，并且可能会影响性能。The `Input` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧式应用程序，`My.Computer.FileSystem`对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Visual Basic 文件访问](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). 数据读取`Input`通过使用通常写入到文件`Write`。Data read with `Input` is usually written to a file by using `Write`. 此函数只能用于的文件在打开`Input`或`Binary`模式。Use this function only with files opened in `Input` or `Binary` mode. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在从文件读取时，不要根据文件扩展名的文件的内容的相关的决策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of the file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 Form1.vb 文件可能不是 Visual Basic 2005 源文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic 2005 source file. 读取时，标准字符串或数值数据就赋给变量而不进行修改。When read, standard string or numeric data is assigned to variables without modification. 下表说明了如何处理其他输入的数据。The following table illustrates how other input data is treated. |数据Data|分配给变量的值Value assigned to variable| |-|-| |分隔逗号或空白的行Delimiting comma or blank line|空Empty| |#NULL ##NULL#|`DBNull`| |#TRUE # 或 #FALSE ##TRUE# or #FALSE#|`True` 或 `False``True` or `False`| |#`yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss`#|日期和/或表达式所表示的时间The date and/or time represented by the expression| |#ERROR `errornumber`##ERROR `errornumber`#|`errornumber` （变量是一个对象标记为错误）`errornumber` (variable is an object tagged as an error)| 如果在输入数据项时达到文件末尾，输入已停止，则会出错。If you reach the end of the file while you are inputting a data item, the input is stopped and an error occurs. > [!NOTE] > `Input`函数未进行本地化。The `Input` function is not localized. 例如，在德国的版本中，如果输入 3,14159，则返回仅 3，因为逗号将被视为变量分隔符而不是作为小数点。For example, in the German version, if you input 3,14159, it returns only 3, because the comma is treated as a variable separator instead of as a decimal point. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过使用从文件读取`Input`函数需要`Read`从访问`FileIOPermissionAccess`枚举。Reading from a file by using the `Input` function requires `Read` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用`Input`函数来从文件读取数据，到两个变量。This example uses the `Input` function to read data from a file into two variables. 此示例假定`TestFile`是具有若干行写入其使用的数据的文件`Write`函数，每行都包含在引用和大量分隔用逗号进行分隔，例如字符串: ("Hello"，234)。This example assumes that `TestFile` is a file that has several lines of data written to it using the `Write` function, each line containing a string in quotations and a number separated by a comma, for example: ("Hello", 234). [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#35)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Input (int FileNumber, ref decimal Value);
.method public static void Input(int32 FileNumber, valuetype System.Decimal& Value) cil managed
Public Sub Input (FileNumber As Integer, ByRef Value As Decimal)
public: static void Input(int FileNumber, System::Decimal % Value);
static member Input : int * -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: Variable that is assigned the values read from the file—cannot be an array or object variable.

或 #FALSE ##TRUE# or #FALSE#|`True` 或 `False``True` or `False`| |#`yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss`#|日期和/或表达式所表示的时间The date and/or time represented by the expression| |#ERROR `errornumber`##ERROR `errornumber`#|`errornumber` （变量是一个对象标记为错误）`errornumber` (variable is an object tagged as an error)| 如果在输入数据项时达到文件末尾，输入已停止，则会出错。If you reach the end of the file while you are inputting a data item, the input is stopped and an error occurs. > [!NOTE] > `Input`函数未进行本地化。The `Input` function is not localized. 例如，在德国的版本中，如果输入 3,14159，则返回仅 3，因为逗号将被视为变量分隔符而不是作为小数点。For example, in the German version, if you input 3,14159, it returns only 3, because the comma is treated as a variable separator instead of as a decimal point. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过使用从文件读取`Input`函数需要`Read`从访问`FileIOPermissionAccess`枚举。Reading from a file by using the `Input` function requires `Read` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用`Input`函数来从文件读取数据，到两个变量。This example uses the `Input` function to read data from a file into two variables. 此示例假定`TestFile`是具有若干行写入其使用的数据的文件`Write`函数，每行都包含在引用和大量分隔用逗号进行分隔，例如字符串: ("Hello"，234)。This example assumes that `TestFile` is a file that has several lines of data written to it using the `Write` function, each line containing a string in quotations and a number separated by a comma, for example: ("Hello", 234). remarks.format: ## Remarks `Input`函数提供用于向后兼容性，并且可能会影响性能。The `Input` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧式应用程序，`My.Computer.FileSystem`对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Visual Basic 文件访问](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). 数据读取`Input`通过使用通常写入到文件`Write`。Data read with `Input` is usually written to a file by using `Write`. 此函数只能用于的文件在打开`Input`或`Binary`模式。Use this function only with files opened in `Input` or `Binary` mode. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在从文件读取时，不要根据文件扩展名的文件的内容的相关的决策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of the file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 Form1.vb 文件可能不是 Visual Basic 2005 源文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic 2005 source file. 读取时，标准字符串或数值数据就赋给变量而不进行修改。When read, standard string or numeric data is assigned to variables without modification. 下表说明了如何处理其他输入的数据。The following table illustrates how other input data is treated. |数据Data|分配给变量的值Value assigned to variable| |-|-| |分隔逗号或空白的行Delimiting comma or blank line|空Empty| |#NULL ##NULL#|`DBNull`| |#TRUE # 或 #FALSE ##TRUE# or #FALSE#|`True` 或 `False``True` or `False`| |#`yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss`#|日期和/或表达式所表示的时间The date and/or time represented by the expression| |#ERROR `errornumber`##ERROR `errornumber`#|`errornumber` （变量是一个对象标记为错误）`errornumber` (variable is an object tagged as an error)| 如果在输入数据项时达到文件末尾，输入已停止，则会出错。If you reach the end of the file while you are inputting a data item, the input is stopped and an error occurs. > [!NOTE] > `Input`函数未进行本地化。The `Input` function is not localized. 例如，在德国的版本中，如果输入 3,14159，则返回仅 3，因为逗号将被视为变量分隔符而不是作为小数点。For example, in the German version, if you input 3,14159, it returns only 3, because the comma is treated as a variable separator instead of as a decimal point. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过使用从文件读取`Input`函数需要`Read`从访问`FileIOPermissionAccess`枚举。Reading from a file by using the `Input` function requires `Read` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用`Input`函数来从文件读取数据，到两个变量。This example uses the `Input` function to read data from a file into two variables. 此示例假定`TestFile`是具有若干行写入其使用的数据的文件`Write`函数，每行都包含在引用和大量分隔用逗号进行分隔，例如字符串: ("Hello"，234)。This example assumes that `TestFile` is a file that has several lines of data written to it using the `Write` function, each line containing a string in quotations and a number separated by a comma, for example: ("Hello", 234). [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#35)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `InputString`函数提供用于向后兼容性，并且可能会影响性能。The `InputString` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧式应用程序，`My.Computer.FileSystem`对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Visual Basic 文件访问](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). 数据读取`InputString`函数通常通过使用写入到文件`Print`或`FilePut`。Data read with the `InputString` function is usually written to a file by using `Print` or `FilePut`. 此函数只能用于的文件在打开`Input`或`Binary`模式。Use this function only with files opened in `Input` or `Binary` mode. 与不同`Input`函数，`InputString`函数返回它所读取的所有字符。Unlike the `Input` function, the `InputString` function returns all the characters it reads. 这包括逗号、 回车、 换行符、 引号引起来和前导空格。This includes commas, carriage returns, line feeds, quotation marks, and leading spaces. 打开以进行文件与`Binary`访问，请尝试使用读取通过文件`InputString`函数直到`EOF`返回`True`生成错误。With files opened for `Binary` access, an attempt to read through the file by using the `InputString` function until `EOF` returns `True` generates an error. 使用`LOF`和`Loc`函数而不是`EOF`时通过使用读取二进制文件`InputString`，或使用`FileGet`当你使用`EOF`函数。Use the `LOF` and `Loc` functions instead of `EOF` when you read binary files by using `InputString`, or use `FileGet` when you use the `EOF` function. > [!NOTE] > 在从文件读取时，不要根据文件扩展名的文件的内容的相关安全决策。When reading from files, do not make security decisions about the contents of the file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 Form1.vb 文件可能不是 Visual Basic 源文件。For example, a file named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## Examples 此示例使用`InputString`函数从文件一次读取一个字符并将其打印到`Output`窗口。This example uses the `InputString` function to read one character at a time from a file and print it to the `Output` window. 此示例假定`MyFile`是具有的示例数据的若干行的文本文件。This example assumes that `MyFile` is a text file that has several lines of sample data. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#33)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Kill` 支持使用多个字符 (`*`) 和单字符 (`?`) 通配符来指定多个文件。`Kill` supports the use of multiple-character (`*`) and single-character (`?`) wildcards to specify multiple files. **安全说明**才能执行，`Kill`函数需要`Read`和`PathDiscovery`标志才能被授予对执行代码。**Security Note** In order to execute, the `Kill` function requires `Read` and `PathDiscovery` flags of to be granted to the executing code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[代码访问权限](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675)For more information, see [Code Access Permissions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675) ## Examples 此示例使用`Kill`函数从磁盘中删除文件。This example uses the `Kill` function to delete a file from a disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#60](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#60)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `LineInput`函数提供用于向后兼容性，并且可能会影响性能。The `LineInput` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧式应用程序，`My.Computer.FileSystem`对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Visual Basic 文件访问](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). 数据读取`LineInput`通过使用通常写入到文件`Print`。Data read with `LineInput` is usually written to a file by using `Print`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在从文件读取时，不要根据文件扩展名的文件的内容的相关的决策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 Form1.vb 文件可能不是 Visual Basic 源文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. `LineInput`函数一次直到它遇到一个回车读取从文件的一个字符 (`Chr(13)`) 或回车/换行 (`Chr(13) + Chr(10)`) 序列。The `LineInput` function reads from a file one character at a time until it encounters a carriage return (`Chr(13)`) or carriage return/line feed (`Chr(13) + Chr(10)`) sequence. 回车符/换行符源的序列将跳过而不是追加到字符字符串。Carriage return/line feed sequences are skipped instead of appended to the character string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过使用从文件读取`LineInput`函数需要`Read`从访问枚举。Reading from a file by using the `LineInput` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用`LineInput`函数以从顺序文件中读取一个行并将其分配给变量。This example uses the `LineInput` function to read a line from a sequential file and assign it to a variable. 此示例假定`TestFile`是具有的示例数据的若干行的文本文件。This example assumes that `TestFile` is a text file that has several lines of sample data. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#19)]

summary.span: Returns a value that specifies the current read/write position in an open file.

span.span: Returns a value that specifies the current read/write position in an open file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Loc`函数是从零开始; 使用它来检索文件中的第一个字节将返回 0。The `Loc` function is zero-based; using it to retrieve the first byte in a file will return 0. `Loc`函数提供用于向后兼容性，并且可能会影响性能。The `Loc` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧式应用程序，`My.Computer.FileSystem`对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Visual Basic 文件访问](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). 下面介绍每种文件访问模式的返回值：The following describes the return value for each file access mode: |模式Mode|返回值Return value| |-|-| |`Random`|读取或写入到文件的最新记录数。Number of the last record read from or written to the file.| |`Sequential`|除以 128 文件中的当前字节位置。Current byte position in the file divided by 128. 但是，通过返回信息`Loc`为顺序文件不是使用也不需要。However, information returned by `Loc` for sequential files is neither used nor required.| |`Binary`|读取或写入的最后一个字节的位置。Position of the last byte read or written.| ## Examples 此示例使用`Loc`函数以返回打开的文件中的当前读/写位置。This example uses the `Loc` function to return the current read/write position in an open file. 此示例假定`MyFile`是具有的示例数据的若干行的文本文件。This example assumes that `MyFile` is a text file that has several lines of sample data. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#17)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Lock`和`Unlock`函数是在环境中使用其中多个进程可能需要访问同一文件。The `Lock` and `Unlock` functions are used in environments where several processes might need access to the same file. `Lock` 和`Unlock`函数始终成对使用。`Lock` and `Unlock` functions are always used in pairs. 自变量`Lock`和`Unlock`必须相同。The arguments to `Lock` and `Unlock` must be identical. 如果`Record`，或`FromRecord`和`ToRecord`是未提供，将被锁定整个文件。If `Record`, or `FromRecord` and `ToRecord` are not supplied, the lock will be for the whole file. 如果`Record`单独指定单个记录将锁定/解锁。If `Record` alone is specified the single record will be locked/unlocked. 如果已打开文件进行连续的输入或输出，`Lock`和`Unlock`影响整个文件，而不考虑指定的范围`FromRecord`和`ToRecord`。If the file has been opened for sequential input or output, `Lock` and `Unlock` affect the whole file, regardless of the range specified by `FromRecord` and`ToRecord`. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用`Lock`和`Unlock`函数。This example illustrates the use of the `Lock` and `Unlock` functions. 此示例假定`People.txt`是一个文件，包含的记录是结构`Person`。This example assumes that `People.txt` is a file that contains records of the structure `Person`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#13)]

param.name: Record
