remarks.format: ## Remarks `Lock`和`Unlock`函数是在环境中使用其中多个进程可能需要访问同一文件。The `Lock` and `Unlock` functions are used in environments where several processes might need access to the same file. `Lock` 和`Unlock`函数始终成对使用。`Lock` and `Unlock` functions are always used in pairs. 自变量`Lock`和`Unlock`必须相同。The arguments to `Lock` and `Unlock` must be identical. 如果`Record`，或`FromRecord`和`ToRecord`是未提供，将被锁定整个文件。If `Record`, or `FromRecord` and `ToRecord` are not supplied, the lock will be for the whole file. 如果`Record`单独指定单个记录将锁定/解锁。If `Record` alone is specified the single record will be locked/unlocked. 如果已打开文件进行连续的输入或输出，`Lock`和`Unlock`影响整个文件，而不考虑指定的范围`FromRecord`和`ToRecord`。If the file has been opened for sequential input or output, `Lock` and `Unlock` affect the whole file, regardless of the range specified by `FromRecord` and`ToRecord`. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用`Lock`和`Unlock`函数。This example illustrates the use of the `Lock` and `Unlock` functions. 此示例假定`People.txt`是一个文件，包含的记录是结构`Person`。This example assumes that `People.txt` is a file that contains records of the structure `Person`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#13)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Print`和`PrintLine`函数提供用于向后兼容性，并且可能会影响性能。The `Print` and `PrintLine` functions are provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧式应用程序，`My.Computer.FileSystem`对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Visual Basic 文件访问](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). `Print` 不包括换行符末尾的换行符。但是，`PrintLine`包括换行符。`Print` does not include a line feed at the end of a line; however, `PrintLine` does include a line feed. 数据使用编写`Print`从文件通常通过使用读取`LineInput`或`Input`。Data written with `Print` is usually read from a file by using `LineInput` or `Input`. 如果省略`Output`为`PrintLine`，该文件; 有关打印一个空行`Print`，没有输出。If you omit `Output` for `PrintLine`, a blank line is printed to the file; for `Print`, nothing is output. 将在选项卡上边界，但混合使用逗号上对齐多个以逗号分隔的表达式和`TAB`可能会导致不一致的结果。Multiple expressions separated with a comma will be aligned on tab boundaries, but mixing commas and `TAB` may cause inconsistent results. 有关`Boolean`数据，`True`或`False`打印。For `Boolean` data, either `True` or `False` is printed. `True`和`False`无论区域设置如何，都不翻译关键字。The `True` and `False` keywords are not translated, regardless of the locale. 日期数据写入文件，通过使用你的系统所识别的标准短日期格式。Date data is written to the file by using the standard short date format recognized by your system. 时的日期或时间组件缺失或为零时，仅提供部分是写入文件。When either the date or the time component is missing or zero, only the part provided is written to the file. 执行任何操作写入文件，如果`Output`数据为空。Nothing is written to the file if `Output` data is empty. 但是，如果`Output`列表数据是`DBNull`，`Null`写入到文件。However, if `Output` list data is `DBNull`, `Null` is written to the file. 有关`Error`数据，输出将显示为`Error errorcode`。For `Error` data, the output appears as `Error errorcode`. `Error`关键字不会进行转换而不考虑区域设置。The `Error` keyword is not translated regardless of the locale. 通过使用写入到文件的所有数据`Print`是国际通用的; 即，数据的格式正确使用适当的小数分隔符。All data written to the file by using `Print` is internationally aware; that is, the data is correctly formatted using the appropriate decimal separator. 如果用户想要输出以供多个区域设置中，数据`Write`应使用。If the user wishes to output data for use by multiple locales, `Write` should be used. 通过使用对文件进行写入`Print`或`PrintLine`函数需要`Write`从访问`FileIOPermissionAccess`枚举。Writing to a file by using the `Print` or `PrintLine` functions requires `Write` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用`Print`和`PrintLine`函数以将数据写入到文件。This example uses the `Print` and `PrintLine` functions to write data to a file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#53](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#53)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Rename`函数重命名文件，并将其移动到不同的目录，如有必要。The`Rename` function renames a file and moves it to a different directory, if it is required. `Rename`函数可以将文件移个驱动器，但它仅可以重命名现有目录时同时`NewPath`和`OldPath`位于相同的驱动器上。The `Rename` function can move a file across drives, but it can only rename an existing directory when both `NewPath` and `OldPath` are located on the same drive. `Rename` 无法创建新文件或目录。`Rename` cannot create a new file or directory. 使用`Rename`函数对打开的文件产生错误。Using the `Rename` function on an open file produces an error. 重命名它前，必须先关闭打开的文件。You must close an open file before renaming it. `Rename` 自变量不能包含多个字符 （\*） 和单字符 （？） 通配符。`Rename` arguments cannot include multiple-character (\*) and single-character (?) wildcards. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用时`Rename`以将文件从受保护的位置复制到受保护的位置，该文件，仍保持较低的限制的权限。When using `Rename` to copy a file from an unprotected location to a protected location, the file retains the less restricted rights. 请检查以确保没有引入可能的安全风险。Check to make sure that you are not introducing a possible security risk. ## Examples 此示例使用`Rename`函数重命名文件。This example uses the `Rename` function to rename a file. 此示例的目的，假定已指定的目录存在。For purposes of this example, assume that the directories that are specified already exist. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#30)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Reset`函数关闭打开的所有活动文件`FileOpen`函数，并且具有相同的功能`FileClose()`不带任何参数。The `Reset` function closes all active files opened by the `FileOpen` function and has the same function as `FileClose()` without any parameters. ## Examples 此示例使用`Reset`函数以关闭所有打开的文件并将所有文件缓冲区的内容写入到磁盘。This example uses the `Reset` function to close all open files and write the contents of all file buffers to disk. 请注意，使用`Object`变量`FileNumber`作为一个字符串和数字。Note the use of the `Object` variable `FileNumber` as both a string and a number. remarks.format: ## Remarks `Seek` 返回一个值介于 1 和 2,147,483,647 之间 (等效于 2 ^31-1) （含）。`Seek` returns a value between 1 and 2,147,483,647 (equivalent to 2^31 – 1), inclusive. 下面介绍每种文件访问模式的返回值：The following describes the return values for each file access mode: |模式Mode|返回值Return Value| |-|-| |`Random`|读取或写入的下一步记录号Number of the next record read or written| |`Binary`, `Input`, `Output`, `Append``Binary`, `Input`, `Output`, `Append`|下一步操作的发生的字节位置。Byte position at which the next operation occurs. 在文件中的第一个字节在位置 1，第二个字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first byte in a file is at position 1, the second byte is at position 2, and so on.| ## Examples 此示例使用`Seek`函数来返回当前的文件位置。This example uses the `Seek` function to return the current file position. 该示例假定`TestFile`是一个文件，包含的记录是结构`Record`。The example assumes `TestFile` is a file that contains records of the structure `Record`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#47](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#47)] 打开的文件中`Random`模式下，`Seek`返回下一条记录的数目。For files opened in `Random` mode, `Seek` returns the number of next record. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#48)] 而在模式下打开的文件`Random`模式下，`Seek`返回下一步操作的发生的字节位置。For files opened in modes other than `Random` mode, `Seek` returns the byte position at which the next operation occurs. 假定`TestFile`是包含若干行文本的文件。Assume `TestFile` is a file that contains several lines of text. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#49](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#49)] 此示例使用`Seek`函数将位置设置为下一步读取或写入的文件中。This example uses the `Seek` function to set the position for the next read or write in a file. 而在模式下打开的文件`Random`模式下，`Seek`设置下一步操作的发生的字节位置。For files opened in modes other than `Random` mode, `Seek` sets the byte position at which the next operation occurs. 假定`TestFile`是包含若干行文本的文件。Assume `TestFile` is a file that contains several lines of text. remarks.format: ## Remarks `Seek` 返回一个值介于 1 和 2,147,483,647 之间 (等效于 2 ^31-1) （含）。`Seek` returns a value between 1 and 2,147,483,647 (equivalent to 2^31 – 1), inclusive. 下面介绍每种文件访问模式的返回值：The following describes the return values for each file access mode: |模式Mode|返回值Return Value| |-|-| |`Random`|读取或写入的下一步记录号Number of the next record read or written| |`Binary`, `Input`, `Output`, `Append``Binary`, `Input`, `Output`, `Append`|下一步操作的发生的字节位置。Byte position at which the next operation occurs. 在文件中的第一个字节在位置 1，第二个字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first byte in a file is at position 1, the second byte is at position 2, and so on.| ## Examples 此示例使用`Seek`函数来返回当前的文件位置。This example uses the `Seek` function to return the current file position. 该示例假定`TestFile`是一个文件，包含的记录是结构`Record`。The example assumes `TestFile` is a file that contains records of the structure `Record`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#47](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#47)] 打开的文件中`Random`模式下，`Seek`返回下一条记录的数目。For files opened in `Random` mode, `Seek` returns the number of next record. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#48)] 而在模式下打开的文件`Random`模式下，`Seek`返回下一步操作的发生的字节位置。For files opened in modes other than `Random` mode, `Seek` returns the byte position at which the next operation occurs. 假定`TestFile`是包含若干行文本的文件。Assume `TestFile` is a file that contains several lines of text. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#49](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#49)] 此示例使用`Seek`函数将位置设置为下一步读取或写入的文件中。This example uses the `Seek` function to set the position for the next read or write in a file. 而在模式下打开的文件`Random`模式下，`Seek`设置下一步操作的发生的字节位置。For files opened in modes other than `Random` mode, `Seek` sets the byte position at which the next operation occurs. 假定`TestFile`是包含若干行文本的文件。Assume `TestFile` is a file that contains several lines of text. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您尝试设置打开的文件的属性，则会发生运行时错误。A run-time error occurs if you try to set the attributes of an open file. `Attributes`参数枚举值如下所示：The `Attributes` argument enumeration values are as follows: |“值”Value|返回的常量Constant|描述Description| |-|-|-| |`Normal`|`vbNormal`|正常 （默认值）。Normal (default).| |`ReadOnly`|`vbReadOnly`|只读。Read-only.| |`Hidden`|`vbHidden`|隐藏。Hidden.| |`System`|`vbSystem`|系统文件。System file.| |`Volume`|`vbVolume`|卷标Volume label| |`Directory`|`vbDirectory`|目录或文件夹。Directory or folder.| |`Archive`|`vbArchive`|自上次备份以来已更改文件。File has changed since last backup.| |`Alias`|`vbAlias`|文件具有不同的名称。File has a different name.| > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic 语言指定这些枚举。These enumerations are specified by the Visual Basic language. 名称可以使用而非实际值在代码中的任意位置。The names can be used anywhere in your code instead of the actual values. ## Examples 此示例使用`SetAttr`函数可设置文件的特性。This example uses the `SetAttr` function to set attributes for a file. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`Count`小于输出线条宽度下, 一步打印位置立即遵循的打印的空格数。If `Count` is less than the output line width, the next print position immediately follows the number of spaces printed. 如果`Count`大于输出线条宽度，`SPC`计算使用公式的下一步打印位置：If`Count` is greater than the output line width, `SPC` calculates the next print position using the formula: `currentprintposition`(+(`Count``Mod``width`))`currentprintposition`(+(`Count``Mod``width`)) 例如，如果打印当前位置为 24，输出行宽度为 80，并指定`SPC(90)`，则下一步打印将开始从位置 34 （打印当前位置 + 90/80 的余数）。For example, if the current print position is 24, the output line width is 80, and you specify `SPC(90)`, the next print will start at position 34 (current print position + the remainder of 90/80). 如果当前打印位置和输出线条宽度之间的区别在于小于`Count`(或`Count` `Mod` *宽度*)，则`SPC`函数将跳到下一步的行的开头，并生成空间等于`Count`– (*宽度*–*小于*)。If the difference between the current print position and the output line width is less than `Count` (or `Count` `Mod` *width*), the `SPC` function skips to the start of the next line and generates spaces equal to `Count` – (*width* – *currentprintposition*). > [!NOTE] > 请确保表格列的宽度足以容纳较宽的字母。Make sure your tabular columns are wide enough to allow for wide letters. ## Examples 此示例使用`SPC`函数位置输出文件中和在**输出**窗口。This example uses the `SPC` function to position output in a file and in the **Output** window. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#16)]

returns.span: Used with the or functions to position output.

span.span: Used with the or functions to position output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在当前行的当前打印位置大于`Column`，`TAB`跳过为列的值等于`Column`下一步的输出行上。If the current print position on the current line is larger than `Column`, `TAB` skips to the column value equal to `Column` on the next output line. 如果`Column`小于 1，`TAB`将打印位置移动到第 1 列。If `Column` is less than 1, `TAB` moves the print position to column 1. 如果`Column`大于输出线条宽度，`TAB`计算使用公式的下一步打印位置：If `Column` is larger than the output line width, `TAB` calculates the next print position using the formula: Mod 列宽Column Mod width 例如，如果*宽度*是 80，并指定`TAB(90)`，则下一个打印将开始列 10 （90/80 的余数）。For example, if *width* is 80 and you specify `TAB(90)`, the next print will start at column 10 (the remainder of 90/80). 如果`Column`小于当前打印位置，在下一行计算的输出位置的打印启动。If `Column` is less than the current print position, printing starts on the next line at the calculated print position. 如果计算出的打印位置大于当前打印位置，打印开始计算在同一行上打印位置。If the calculated print position is larger than the current print position, printing starts at the calculated print position on the same line. 在输出行上的最左边打印位置始终为 1。The leftmost print position on an output line is always 1. 当你使用`Print`或`PrintLine`函数来打印到文件，最右边的打印位置是输出文件中，你可以使用设置的当前宽度`FileWidth`函数。When you use the `Print` or `PrintLine` functions to print to files, the rightmost print position is the current width of the output file, which you can set using the `FileWidth` function. `TAB`函数还可用于`WriteLine`函数。The `TAB` function can also be used with the `WriteLine` function. 它不能与使用或。It cannot be used with or . > [!NOTE] > 请确保表格列的宽度足以包含较宽的字母。Make sure your tabular columns are wide enough to contain wide letters. ## Examples 此示例使用`TAB`函数位置输出文件中和在**输出**窗口。This example uses the `TAB` function to position output in a file and in the **Output** window. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#37](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#37)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Lock`和`Unlock`函数是在环境中使用其中多个进程可能需要访问同一文件。The `Lock` and `Unlock` functions are used in environments where several processes might need access to the same file. `Lock` 和`Unlock`函数始终成对使用。`Lock` and `Unlock` functions are always used in pairs. 自变量`Lock`和`Unlock`必须相同。The arguments to `Lock` and `Unlock` must be identical. 如果`Record`，或`FromRecord`和`ToRecord`是未提供，将被锁定整个文件。If `Record`, or `FromRecord` and `ToRecord` are not supplied, the lock will be for the whole file. 如果`Record`单独指定单个记录将锁定/解锁。If `Record` alone is specified the single record will be locked/unlocked. 如果已打开文件进行连续的输入或输出，`Lock`和`Unlock`影响整个文件，而不考虑指定的范围`FromRecord`和`ToRecord`。If the file has been opened for sequential input or output, `Lock` and `Unlock` affect the whole file, regardless of the range specified by `FromRecord` and`ToRecord`. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用`Lock`和`Unlock`函数。This example illustrates the use of the `Lock` and `Unlock` functions. 此示例假定`People.txt`是一个文件，包含的记录是结构`Person`。This example assumes that `People.txt` is a file that contains records of the structure `Person`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#13)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Write`和`WriteLine`函数提供用于向后兼容性，并且可能会影响性能。The `Write` and `WriteLine` functions are provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧式应用程序，`My.Computer.FileSystem`对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Visual Basic 文件访问](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). 如果省略`Output`，向文件打印一个空行。If you omit `Output`, a blank line is printed to the file. 可以用逗号分隔多个表达式。Multiple expressions can be separated with a comma. 与不同`Print`函数，`Write`函数插入项与字符串周围的引号之间的逗号，按它们写入到文件的形式。Unlike the `Print` function, the `Write` function inserts commas between items and quotation marks around strings as they are written to the file. 无需显式分隔符放入列表。You do not have to put explicit delimiters in the list. 当`Write`用于将数据写入到文件中，仅数字`Boolean`，日期、 null 和`Error`支持数据格式。When `Write` is used to write data to a file, only numeric, `Boolean`, date, null, and `Error` data formats are supported. 下面的通用假设遵循这样的数据始终能够阅读和使用正确的解释`Input`，而不考虑区域设置：The following universal assumptions are followed so the data can always be read and correctly interpreted using `Input`, regardless of locale: - 使用句点作为小数分隔符始终写入数值数据。Numeric data is always written using the period as the decimal separator. - 有关`Boolean`数据，`#TRUE#`或`#FALSE#`打印。For `Boolean` data, either `#TRUE#` or `#FALSE#` is printed. `True`和`False`无论区域设置如何，都不翻译关键字。The `True` and `False` keywords are not translated, regardless of locale. - 日期数据写入到使用的通用日期格式的文件。Date data is written to the file using the universal date format. 时的日期或时间组件缺失或为零时，仅提供部分是写入文件。When either the date or the time component is missing or zero, only the part provided is written to the file. - 执行任何操作写入文件，如果`Output`数据为空。Nothing is written to the file if `Output` data is empty. 但是，对于 null 数据一样，`#NULL#`写入。However, for null data, `#NULL#` is written. - 有关`Error`数据，输出将显示为`#ERROR errorcode#`。For `Error` data, the output appears as `#ERROR errorcode#`. `Error`不转换关键字，而不考虑区域设置。The `Error` keyword is not translated, regardless of locale. `WriteLine` 将插入一个换行符 (即回车符/换行符，或`Chr(13) + Chr(10)`)，在其写入的最后一个字符后`Output`文件。`WriteLine` inserts a newline character (that is, a carriage return/line feed, or `Chr(13) + Chr(10)`), after it has written the final character in `Output` to the file. 可以在字符串中嵌入引号引起来通过使用双引号括起来，或""。You can embed quotation marks in a string by using double quotation marks, or "". 例如，应用于对象的For example, [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#63](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#63)] 返回的值的字符串`Double quotation marks aren't "difficult" to handle`。returns a string with the value of `Double quotation marks aren't "difficult" to handle`. 通过使用对文件进行写入`Write`或`WriteLine`函数需要`Append`从访问`FileIOPermissionAccess`枚举。Writing to a file by using the `Write` or `WriteLine` functions requires `Append` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用`Write`函数以将原始数据写入到顺序的文件。This example uses the `Write` function to write raw data to a sequential file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#64](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#64)]

执行任何操作写入文件，如果`Output`数据为空。Nothing is written to the file if `Output` data is empty. 但是，对于 null 数据一样，`#NULL#`写入。However, for null data, `#NULL#` is written. - 有关`Error`数据，输出将显示为`#ERROR errorcode#`。For `Error` data, the output appears as `#ERROR errorcode#`. `Error`不转换关键字，而不考虑区域设置。The `Error` keyword is not translated, regardless of locale. `WriteLine` 将插入一个换行符 (即回车符/换行符，或`Chr(13) + Chr(10)`)，在其写入的最后一个字符后`Output`文件。`WriteLine` inserts a newline character (that is, a carriage return/line feed, or `Chr(13) + Chr(10)`), after it has written the final character in `Output` to the file. 可以在字符串中嵌入引号引起来通过使用双引号括起来，或""。You can embed quotation marks in a string by using double quotation marks, or "". 例如，应用于对象的For example, [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#63](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#63)] 返回的值的字符串`Double quotation marks aren't "difficult" to handle`。returns a string with the value of `Double quotation marks aren't "difficult" to handle`. 通过使用对文件进行写入`Write`或`WriteLine`函数需要`Append`从访问`FileIOPermissionAccess`枚举。Writing to a file by using the `Write` or `WriteLine` functions requires `Append` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用`Write`函数以将原始数据写入到顺序的文件。This example uses the `Write` function to write raw data to a sequential file.
